LocationUnavailable.title: Enable your Location
LocationUnavailable.text: The app requires access to your location to recommend routes and calculate fares.

LocationLoading.title: Location loading...
LocationLoading.text: The app is retrieving your location from the browser. This might take a moment.

introduction.title: Taxi Assistant
introduction.subtitle: The app helps taxi drivers in maximising revenue and minimising downtime

findHotspots.title: Find Hotspots
findHotspots.subwindowSummary: A live heatmap shows you 'where the money is' right now.
findHotspots.subwindowDescription: Using historical and live data, the system predicts demand at street-level granularity for the next 15–60 minutes, so drivers can position themselves proactively instead of reacting to dips.

rideScoring.title: Ride Scoring
rideScoring.description: Get a score for each ride
rideScoring.subwindowSummary: Ride-Value Scoring helps drivers make informed decisions about which rides to accept.
rideScoring.subwindowDescription: The system assigns a score to each ride based on factors like distance, time, and demand, helping drivers prioritize high-value rides. This feature is designed to maximize earnings and minimize downtime.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: View your earnings and ride history
dashboard.subwindowSummary: View your earnings and ride history
dashboard.subwindowDescription: The dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of your earnings and ride history, allowing you to track your performance over time. It includes features like daily earnings, ride counts, and detailed ride logs.

signin.passwordError: Please input a valid password(At least 8 characters)
signin.emailError: Please input a valid email address

signup.passwordError: Please input a valid password(At least 8 characters)
signup.emailError: Please input a valid email address

BreakReminderModal.title: Take a break!
BreakReminderModal.text: You’ve been driving for more than 3 hours without a break! We recommend that you take a short 15 minute break.

StartBreakModal.title: Take a break!
StartBreakModal.text: How long would you like to take a break for?

NoRouteFoundModal.title: No Route
NoRouteFoundModal.text: No route was found to your specified destination.

UnknownLocationModal.title: Unknown Destination
UnknownLocationModal.text: The location you specified could not be found. The route cannot be displayed.

RouteErrorModal.title: Internal Error
RouteErrorModal.text: An unknown error occurred. The route cannot be displayed.

profile.signOutWarning: Are you sure you want to sign out?
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

manageRidesDay.noShifts: No shifts found for this day.
